title: Are Riot even thinking of making PBE Signup possible ever again?
body: Been a few months already where it is down for "maintenance" . Just wondering because before all the changes a few years back I had an account but I forgot the details and now I cant make a new one

replies.body: We still plan on bringing PBE signups back, but I don't yet have a hard date on when you can expect it to open again. You can be sure to know by checking the PBE status page or our news page.
